marklogic.body: The Yanks will have hitting problems this year. For three years they have put their hitting focus on the short porch ( even righty Jeter hits his HRs there). Everybody has it figured out how to pitch them now ( as the game 5 against Detroit) and after 3 years of batting that way they will find adjusting hard. Granderson better wear an elbow pad because he'll get a steady diet of high inside Heat to back him Off and then low and away. I could be wrong but I wouldn't bet on Grandy getting 40 HRs this year.
